column4: where does the line... "Linux host 2.6.17-10-server #2 SMP Fri Oct 13 18:47:26 UTC 2006 i686" come from when logging in remotely?  i didnt put that line in /etc/motd
i dont think so, because no matter what i put in /etc/issue it doesnt effect remote connection, and /etc/issue.net doesnt stop that line from printing
found it, was in bootmisc.sh in /etc/init.d
nice! What version are you using then? I never actually edited the motd or issue on Ubuntu, but for Debian (sarge at least) those are the files that need to be edited.
